Articles.Content: Whenever I dock, especially with the 1m docking ports, my space station keeps wobbling around everywhere. Is there a way to use something like the struts or to connect my crafts?
The Quantum Struts mod will allow you to add struts in orbit.
Same goes for Docking Strut. But be sure to take THIS ONE and not the one you find on Spaceport the regular way, that one is bugged.

Wobbling tends to get worse if you have more than a single ASAS unit after docking. The most efficient way to stop the structure from wobbling in that case would be to turn off SAS and then time accelerate for a second as to have it stop.
